text: Martha Ruth Stewart Shelley ( Haworth; October 7, 1922 â€“ February 17, 2021), better known as Martha Stewart, was an American actress. She was known for playing Mildred Atkinson in In a Lonely Place (1950) with Humphrey Bogart. Stewart died on February 17, 2021 at the age of 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Kentucky
title: Martha Stewart (actress)
